statusDetails.message:
Unable to create requested service [org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.env.spi.JdbcEnvironment] due to: Error calling JDBC 'DriverManager.getConnection()' [Communications link failure

The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 milliseconds ago. The driver has not received any packets from the server.]
